configuration.title: Программное обеспечение
configuration.configContainer:
<config xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="../../../../../../target/classes/advimport/schema1.xsd" save-log="true" threads-number="1"> <mode>CREATE</mode> <mode>UPDATE</mode> <gui-parameter name="fileCI" type="FILE" title="Выберите файл (CSV)"/>
<!-- Задает метакласс импортируемых объектов --> <parameter name="CIMetaClass">objectBase$Software</parameter> <parameter name="CIIdHolder">idHolder</parameter>
<!-- Импорт ИТ-активов --> <class name="Software" threads-number="1"> <parameter name="metaClass">${CIMetaClass}</parameter>
<csv-data-source with-header="true" file-name="${fileCI}" delimiter=";" encoding="CP1251" id-column="id"> <column name="id" src-key="UUID"/> <column name="title" src-key="Title"/> <column name="version" src-key="Version"/> <column name="license" src-key="license"/> <column name="requirements" src-key="requirements"/> <column name="serialNumber" src-key="serialNumber"/> <column name="description" src-key="description"/> <column name="distribution" src-key="distribution"/> <column name="sortwareType" src-key="sortwareType"/> <column name="Price" src-key="Price"/> </csv-data-source>
<constant-metaclass-resolver/> <object-searcher attr="${CIIdHolder}"/>
<attr name="${CIIdHolder}" column="id"/> <attr name="title" column="title"/> <attr name="version" column="version"/> <attr name="license" column="license"/> <attr name="requirements" column="requirements"/> <attr name="serialNumber" column="serialNumber"/> <attr name="description" column="description"/> <attr name="distribution" column="distribution"/> <attr name="sortwareType" column="sortwareType"/> <attr name="Price" column="Price"/> </class> </config>
